page.title: 20Employment Opportunities
page.content:
There is little unemployment in this rural area but most people have to travel to surrounding areas to work. There is one small carpenters business in Wistow, employing 5 people and one motor engineers in Great Raveley employing 6 people. The farms are arable and mechanised offering little employment compared to those employed on the land in the past. Five people are self employed, carrying out small building and repair works.
The information entered on grid no. 05240279 was researched and prepared by members of Upwood Womens Institute.
